FuncDef: This command assign a BFD session provide heart-beat mechanism for given IPsec tunnel. There can be only one BFD session assigned to any given IPsec tunnel, but there can be multiple IPsec tunnels using same BFD session. BFD control the state of the associated tunnel, if BFD session goes down, system will also bring down the associated non-designated IPsec tunnel.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies where the service-id that the BFD session resides. Values-{id | svc-name}.
Specifies the name of the interface used by the BFD session, up to 32 characters.
Specifies the destination address to be used for the BFD session. Values-ipv4-address - a.b.c.d.
Identifies the service, up to 64 characters.
